title-group.article-title: How to avoid speaking of the other: Derrida, Dionysius and the problematic of negative theology

ref.mixed-citation: 'The Original Discussion of "Différance",' in Derrida and Différance, ed. David Wood (Warwick, Parousia, 1985), pp. 132, 130.
Paul Ricoeur, 'A Response,' Biblical Research, 24 (1979), 74.
Mark C. Taylor, nOts (Chicago and London: Chicago University Press, 1993), pp. 47-49;
